lom:description.lom:string: This page of the ProTeacher website provides Earth science-related lesson plans, activities, labs, experiments, images, and illustrations for the K-6 teacher. Topics include geology, dinosaurs, physical geography, biomes, rocks and minerals, earthquakes, volcanoes, water, oceans, space flight, the solar system, weather, maps, teaching materials, and more. ProTeacher also offers reference links, theme ideas, and classroom management articles for teachers.

lom:keyword.lom:string: Atmospheric science,Biological oceanography,Educational theory and practice,Geology,Mineralogy or petrology,Paleontology,Physical geography,Space science
